summary: Utility module that defines structures and helpers for creating, storing, and accessing code coverage configuration and metadata used during Ansible test execution. It includes a custom error type, a version descriptor for coverage tool releases, and functions to generate coverage config files, retrieve environment details, platform information, version identifiers, and SQLite schema versions.
business_intent: Enable reliable collection and management of code coverage data across different Python interpreter versions when running Ansible integration and sanity tests, facilitating analysis of test coverage and ensuring compatibility with supported Python releases.
